subject: Automobile Racing
Economic Conditions and Trends
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After Martinsville, Va., spent the past decade remodeling its economy on the motorsports industry, the town's effort has largely failed and the recession has hastened its decline.
snippet: After Martinsville, Va., spent the past decade remodeling its economy on the motorsports industry, the town's effort has largely failed and the recession has hastened its decline.
